sentence.Network_en: The tone of the book is sometimes too flip.

sentence.Network_en: They would flap bath towels from their balconies as they chatted.

sentence.Network_en: The trade deficit is the flip side of a rapidly expanding economy.
sentence.Network_cn: 贸易赤字是经济快速发展带来的负面产物。
